author: paulhauner
content:
Here are my summarised thoughts on the prater/goerli alias:

https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/3338#issuecomment-1189976253

TL;DR I think that LH is going to go ahead with Goerli being an entirely different (but compatible) network to Prater. This means that existing users who understand the Prater+Goerli union can stay with `--network prater` and know they won't have their directory structure change under their feet now or in the future. New users, on the other hand, can just start using `--network goerli` and never know that Prater was ever a thing. It's also less work ðŸš€

author: parithosh
content:
MSF9 is finalizing again: https://beaconchain.mainnetshadowfork9.ethdevops.io/

It had a non-finality period of ~1300 epochs I think. A combination of fixes and migrating a lot of validators to target healthy beacon nodes brought  a lot of the network back online. 

Switching back to finality after such a big non-finality period saw no issues, everything seems to have proceeded as expected. Some client teams are still testing fixes, so the shadow fork will stay around until that's done.
